title: Latest updates: Derbyshire Live on Friday 24 March 2017 - BBC News
summary: banks set to close across derbyshire .
burst water main road closed until next week .
volunteers needed to secure heage windmill 's future .
news , sport , travel and weather updates resume at 08:00 monday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: live updates for derbyshire and east staffordshire have finished for the day , but we 'll be back at 08:00 on monday with all the latest news , sport , travel and weather .

documents.title: weather : cold and clear night ahead
text: tonight will be a cold and clear night with temperatures falling to 2c ( 36f ) .
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: water supplies back on in de22
text: good news - repairs in the de22 area are complete and everything is back to normal .
severn trent said emergency repairs had to be carried out which affected some water supplies .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: goose 'shot ' with arrow in park
text: the rspca is concerned that someone is shooting geese with arrows in a derbyshire park after a bird had to be put down .
a member of the public contacted the charity on saturday after they spotted a goose with an arrow in its body , at poolsbrook park , in staveley .
the goose suffered a bad wing injury and had to be put to sleep by a vet , the rspca said .
the animal charity said it had been notified of a second incident but the goose was unharmed .
they are urging anyone with information to contact them .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man arrested at east midlands airport after drug operation
text: police have said a man 's been arrested after being found in possession of a controlled substance at east midlands airport .
specialist search dogs were used during an operation at the airport today and a number of people admitted to having consumed/smoked drugs before arriving at the airport .
the matter has now been passed onto the uk customs authorities .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: police seeking driver after robbery near tesco
text: derbyshire police are looking for people who may have seen a woman running away from a robber near tesco in heanor .
a man threatened the woman with a jagged metal can at about 23:00 on 4 february .
the 28-year-old woman ran off into the tesco car park and banged on a car window asking for help , before being helped by staff inside the store .
police now want to speak to the driver of the car as they may have information which could help officers .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your photos : enchanting edensor
text: what a beautiful photo taken of edensor village by weather watcher mike swain .
if you look closely in the far distance you can see the hunting tower behind chatsworth house .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: chester green road closure affecting shop owner
text: earlier on i caught up with shop owners near mansfield road to see if their businesses had been affected since the burst water main .
ray garlick who owns a trade shop said his business has suffered since the road closures in the area .
`` it 's awful .
i ca n't tell my staff to go home and say i ca n't pay you this week because we 've got no business .
`` it 's going to cause a massive effect and we 'll probably make quite a considerable loss this month . ''
author: Heidi Booth
Journalist, BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: will hugh training with team in germany
text: here 's derby 's will hughes in training ahead of tonight 's game in germany
our u21s trained in wiesbaden earlier this evening ahead of friday 's game with @ twitterid at the brita arena .
you can see more photos from the u21s ' training session in wiesbaden last night in our gallery : # younglions
@ twitterid @ twitterid do n't return gomez to us injured
author: Owen Bradley
BBC Radio Derby Sport

documents.title: large load heading towards m1
text: a quarry truck leaving pye bridge is heading towards the m1 on j28 via the a38 .
minor delays are expected on the roads .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather : pleasant afternoon ahead
text: cloud will clear and there should be plenty of blue sky and sunshine around this afternoon .
highs of 13c ( 55f ) .
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: travel : one lane closed on m1 near east midlands airport
text: a broken down vehicle on the m1 northbound is causing congestion between junction 24 and 23a near east midlands airport .
one of the four lanes is currently closed .
here 's how it 's looking like at the moment
author: BBC News Travel

documents.title: will hughes and cauley woodrow face germany tonight
text: england 's under-21s face germany tonight .
derby county 's will hughes and burton albion 's cauley woodrow are both in the england squad .
author: BBC Derby Sport

documents.title: adam peaty : defending olympic title 'main motivation '
text: adam peaty says the chance to become the first british swimmer to defend an olympic title is driving him towards tokyo 2020 .
the reigning commonwealth and european champion destroyed the field by more than a second and a half in winning 100m breaststroke gold at rio 2016 .
`` i think i can defend my titles , but defending my olympic title is my main motivation , '' peaty , 22 , told bbc .
author: BBC Derby Sport

documents.title: red nose day derby peugeot
text: the staff at peugeot are doing their bit for comic relief
comic relief # rednoseday sales team cycling in the showroom the distance from # derby @ twitterid to # london @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid
good luck !
^hugo
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: volunteers wanted to help secure heage windmill 's future
text: heage windmill is set to reopen for the year on 1 april .
members of the windmill are calling for volunteers to help secure its long-term future .
brian naylor wants people to go along and learn to be a tour guide or even a miller .
mr naylor says without a new influx of volunteers , the hard work of restoring the windmill could be lost in the next 20 years .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: water disruption in the de22 area
text: severn trent has said customers in the de22 area of derby may experience a disruption to their water supply for a short while as they carry out a repair on one of the water mains in the area .
the company said it is certain it is not related to the burst water main in chester green .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: happy red nose day
text: sally pepper was the only person in radio derby who made the effort to put on a red nose this morning
people across the uk will put on their red attire to take part in fundraising for .
comic relief .
are you doing anything for red nose day ?
if so i 'd love to see , you can send on .
twitter .
or by .
email .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: burst water main : hole covered and work continues
text: notice something different ?
the hole has been covered at last .
reinstatement work has started in chester green and severn trent said it will take a few days for the tarmac to cure .
the road will remain closed until tuesday
author: Heidi Booth
Journalist, BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: watch : weather for the east midlands
text: a beautiful day expected across the region today
author: Charlie Slater
BBC Weather presenter

documents.title: burst water main road closed until next week
text: severn trent water said mansfield road and some adjoining roads in chester green will remain closed until next week .
access to the road has been closed since sunday after a. burst water main .
smashed windows and flooded homes .
there have been long delays across the city as a result of the road closure .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: bank closures set across derbyshire
text: five natwest banks are set to close in derbyshire by the end of october , part of 128 being shut nationally
the branches are
across the country , about 770 staff will be affected with the firm blaming the rise in online banking .
a further 30 rbs branches will also close .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your photos : chesterfield
text: what a beautiful start to the day in chesterfield .
thanks for sending this gorgeous snap in from this morning 's sunrise viki the blue .
if you have any then send them our way here .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: travel : slow traffic on a61 and a52
text: there is currently slow traffic on the a61 and a52 towards the pentagon island .
author: BBC News Travel

documents.title: good morning : welcome to today 's live updates
text: good morning and welcome along to friday across derbyshire .
i 'll be with you until later with the region 's news , sport , weather and travel .
if you are doing anything for red nose day then please get in touch .
via facebook , .
twitter .
or .
email .
and i 'll share some of the best and stories .
author: Khia Lewis-Todd
BBC Local Live
